params.contentId: The ID of the content to be approved.
The ID of the content to be rejected.
The ID of the content to be submitted.
params.initiator: The address of the initiator submitting the content.

approve(uint256).notice: Approves a proposition in the referendum.

reject(uint256).notice: Rejects a proposition in the referendum.

submit(uint256,address).notice: Submits a new proposition for referendum.
